summary: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.
cast: Henry Cavill|Mickey Rourke|Stephen Dorff|Freida Pinto|Luke Evans|John Hurt|Joseph Morgan|Anne Day-Jones|Greg Bryk|Alan Van Sprang|Peter Stebbings|Daniel Sharman|Isabel Lucas|Kellan Lutz|Steve Byers|Stephen McHattie|Matthew G. director: Director: Tarsem Singh (as Tarsem Singh Dhandwar)
title: Immortals
